member.name: M:SotnApi.ActorApi.FindAvailableActorSlot
member.summary: Scans memory for an empty actor slot.
member.returns: The address where the slot starts. Or 0 if a free slot was not found.

member.summary: Spawns, finds and edits actor entities in memory.

member.name: M:SotnApi.Interfaces.IActorApi.FindEnemy(System.Int32,System.Int32)

member.returns: The address where the enemy entity starts. Or 0 if the enemy was not found.
